org.xbill.DNS
Class RRset

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xbill.DNS.RRset
public class RRset
extends Object

A set of Records with the same name, type, and class. Also included are all SIG records signing the data records.

See Also:
Record, SIGRecord

Constructor Summary
RRset()
          Creates an empty RRset

          Adds a Record to an RRset

          Returns the ttl of the records

          Returns the type of the records see @Type
 Enumeration rrs()
          Returns an Enumeration listing all (data) records.

          Returns an Enumeration listing all signature records

          Returns the number of (data) records

clear

public void clear()
Deletes all Records from an RRset

rrs

public Enumeration rrs()
Returns an Enumeration listing all (data) records. This cycles through the records, so each Enumeration will start with a different record.

sigs

public Enumeration sigs()
Returns an Enumeration listing all signature records

Returns the number of (data) records
